name: Runnner
description:
My second game i made in Unity!

  • I am very bad designer
  • And I don't now how to make good music

That's why I start small and I hope you leave a comment with what you want to see next in the game or a now game idea. Thx :)

Ps: If you want to make a music for the game notify my.
